Shuvann:
Slay all of the monsters in the Fields of Massacre: Spiteful Soul Leader, Spiteful Soul Wizard, Spiteful Soul Warrior, Archer of Destruction, Doom Scout, Graveyard Lich, Dismal Pole, Graveyard Predator, Doom Servant, Doom Guard, Doom Archer, Doom Trooper, Doom Warrior, and Doom Knight, and collect 200 Slaughterer Marks.
After completing the mission, report to Captain Mathias in the Town of Rune.
